CommonFields.Title: Fabrication and characterization of TiO2–epoxy nanocomposite
Author: Chatterjee, Amit
Islam, Muhammad S.
CommonFields.Location: Center for Composite Materials, University of Delaware, Newark DE-19716, DE, USA

MatrixComponent.ChemicalName: diglycidylether of bisphenol A epoxy resin
MatrixComponent.ManufacturerOrSourceName: Applied Poleramic Inc., Benecia, CA, USA
Applied Poleramic Inc., Benecia, CA, USA

Mixing.Description: In order to avoid temperature rise during sonication, exter- nal cooling was employed by submerging the mixing beaker in a mixture of ice and water.

Dynamic_Mechanical_Analysis.Description: at a frequency of 1 Hz using dual cantilever clamp with amplitude of 15 micrometers
